name: Maa Savitri Foundation

address: Near Kodhna Mata Mandir, Rana Pratap Marg,Khalwa

briefDescription: The Maa Savitri Foundation,balrampur the organisation aims at the development activities for building up an over all welfare oriented strategy in the socio-economic sector,health, education,environment, population control, agriculture, rural development and entrepreneurship development in different sections of society.The main function of the organization are in the area of vocational training,womenâ€™s empowerment programme  research, action-oriented programme, consultancy and holding workshops, seminar an planning development.Currently  the organization in engaged in training programme Awareness generation ,family consuling ,book fair, nutrition and child Labour Elimination programme.
